paragraph.heading: 2Compiling
paragraph.paragraph:
To compile the example:
Launch EiffelStudio.
Select Use existing Ace (control file) and click OK
Browse to ENViSioN! root directory Eiffel54\examples\dotnet\winforms\hello_world\.
Choose .ace
Choose the directory where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the Ace file.
Click OK.
paragraph.heading: 2Running
paragraph.paragraph: After launching the application, you will see a window displayed with a similar appearance to the one above. This is the simplest windows form we can display. We have just set the title with "HelloWorld".
paragraph.heading: 2Under the Hood
paragraph.paragraph: The application shows how to display a Windows Form under the windows environment. The application inherits the FORM class, and just set the title with "Hello world" with the inherited feature set_title.
